PAD_NoticeScryingEye.synopsis: Player notices the Scrying Eye - a creature through which someone can watch from a distance.

PAD_SecretEntranceBlocked.synopsis: Spoken when a player tries to open a trapdoor in the goblin throne room but finds it blocked - the trapdoor leads up to the platform above the festivities area, and can be opened from the outside.

PAD_NoticeScryingEye_0.speaker: Player
PAD_NoticeScryingEye_0.text: A scrying eye - best not do anything suspicious while it's watching.

PAD_SecretEntranceBlocked_0.speaker: Player
PAD_SecretEntranceBlocked_0.text: Something's blocking it from the other side.
